name: WhateverTree
summary: A dead tree goes viral, attracting wildlife, a nature lover, and a crowd of online followers. Animated entirely outside, “WhateverTree” examines our connection to nature in the age of social media, screens, and selfies.
info:
• 中文名: 不知所舞树
  • 话数: 1
  • 放送开始: 2020-03-09(加拿大)
  • 导演: Isaac King
  • 编剧: Isaac King
  • 片长: 11分钟
